DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Sertraline Hydrochloride 100mg Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , single-dose , two-way , crossover study conduct compare relative bioavailability two formulation 100 mg sertraline hydrochloride tablet fast condition . The study conduct 36 ( 30 complete ) healthy adult accordance protocol No . 10540323 ( Revision 0 ) . In study period , single 100 mg dose administer subject follow overnight fast least 10 hour . The test formulation Ranbaxy Research Laboratories 's Sertraline Hydrochloride 100 mg Tablets reference formulation ZOLOFT® ( sertraline hydrochloride ) 100 mg Tablets Manufactured Roerig ( Division Pfizer ) . The subject receive test product one study period reference product period ; order administration accord dose randomization schedule . There 14-day interval treatment . Blood sample collect pre-dose interval 144 hour dose . The plasma sample subject complete period study send Helen Fassoulas , B.Sc. , Director Operations , Warnex Bioanalytical Services Inc. , 3885 boul Industriel , Laval , Quebec , H7LAS3 Canada , Telephone : 450-663-6724 , ext . 438 , FAX : 450-975-8111 determination sertraline plasma concentration . Statistical analysis perform Yetta I. Wilbur , Biostatistician , Novum Pharmaceutical Research Services , 5900 Penn Avenue , Pittsburgh , PA 15206 , USA , Telephone : 412-363-3300 , Fax : 412-362-5783 evaluate relative bioavailability test formulation reference product . A total 36 healthy adult subject .
